definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="394" y="40"><field name="trigger">minecraft_world_loaded</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:SetNewSpawn</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:SetNewSpawn</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="set_global_spawn"><value name="x"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">500</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="world_data_heightat"><field name="heightType">MOTION_BLOCKING_NO_LEAVES</field><value name="x"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">500</field></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">500</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">500</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
